events.message: The customer reported an accident involving their vehicle hitting a guardrail on the highway at dawn.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the description involving a car collision.
An agent was assigned to manage and oversee the insurance claim related to the vehicle accident.
The insured party received official confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged by the insurer.
Request sent for accident photos, police report, and driver's license copy to proceed with the auto claim investigation.
The customer uploaded all requested documents, including accident photos and an official police report.
The claims department commenced investigation on the collision to verify details and liability factors.
Investigation finalized with confirmation that the insured vehicle was not at fault in the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the full repair cost and rental car reimbursement.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and swift processing.
The claim was officially approved based on the investigation outcome and agreement from the insured.
Insurance payout was issued to the claimant for repair costs and additional expenses related to the vehicle accident.
The claim was closed following successful payment and confirmation of repair completion on the insured vehicle.
